p.d: With votes from the audience and votes from the professionals: the "Décibels Music Awards" reward artists from the Wallonia-Brussels Federation. A festive ambiance with performances by Lio, Typh Barrow, LoIc Nottet, Lous and The Yakuza, Glauque, Claire Laffut and Yseult, Kid Noize, Henri PFR, Scylla, Behind The Pines. Presented by: Joëlle Scoriels. Recorded in Liege, 19 February 2020.
